articles.title: BMW clocks sales milestone in India, sells highest number of luxury cars in the first 6 months of the year - HT Auto
articles.description: BMW has sold more than 5,000 luxury cars in the first six months of this year, more than 1,400 in June alone. It also leads in luxury electric vehicles too, with the iX outselling all other luxury EVs combined.
